name: Crab Rage
description:
Have you wanted to play Crab rave by Noisetorm? This is your opportunity!

Use Up, Left and Right arrows to follow every crab movement.

Made with vanilla javascript on Visual Studio Code. Graphics are made in Inkscape and music in Garageband.

Kudos to Noisetorm!

Team:

Andrei - has 10 years and is learning game programing. Role: programming, music, game designer.

Alin - Andrei's dad. Trying to make Andrei a good game programmer. Role: programming, graphics.
